title: Introducing Relique: The Future of Collectibles Authentication
excerpt: Discover how Relique is revolutionizing the authentication of collectibles and memorabilia through advanced AI technology.
content:
# Introducing Relique

Relique.co represents a new era in collectibles authentication. Our platform combines cutting-edge AI technology with rigorous verification processes to ensure the authenticity of your most valuable items.

## Why Relique?

- **Probabilistic Authentication**: Our AI analyzes multiple factors to provide confidence scores
- **Transparent Process**: Every verification includes detailed explanations
- **Trusted Platform**: Built for collectors, by collectors

## Getting Started

Whether you're looking to verify an item or browse authenticated collectibles, Relique makes it easy.
author: Relique Team

title: How to Verify Your Collectibles: A Step-by-Step Guide
excerpt: Learn the simple process of verifying your collectibles through Relique's platform.
content:
# How to Verify Your Collectibles

Verifying your collectibles with Relique is straightforward and secure.

## Step 1: Prepare Your Item

Take clear photos of your item from multiple angles. Include any certificates or documentation you have.

## Step 2: Submit for Verification

Use our verification tool to upload images and provide details about your item.

## Step 3: Review Results

Our AI analyzes your submission and provides a detailed authentication report with confidence scores.

## Understanding Results

- **Qualified**: High confidence in authenticity
- **Inconclusive**: More information needed
- **Disqualified**: Likely not authentic
author: Relique Team

title: Marketplace Launch: Browse Authenticated Collectibles
excerpt: Our marketplace is now live! Browse verified collectibles and memorabilia from trusted sellers.
content:
# Marketplace Launch

We're excited to announce the launch of the Relique Marketplace, where you can browse and purchase authenticated collectibles with confidence.

## What Makes Our Marketplace Different

Every item in our marketplace has been verified through our authentication process. You can trust that what you're buying is authentic.

## Featured Categories

- Sports Memorabilia
- Entertainment Collectibles
- Historical Documents
- Autographed Items

## For Sellers

Interested in consigning your items? Our consignment process is simple and transparent.
author: Relique Team

title: Spotlight: Michael Jordan Signed Basketball
excerpt: This month's featured item showcases an authenticated basketball signed by Michael Jordan.
content:
# Spotlight: Michael Jordan Signed Basketball

This exceptional piece of sports memorabilia features an official NBA basketball signed by Michael Jordan in 1996.

## Authentication Details

- **Verification Status**: Qualified
- **Confidence Score**: 94%
- **Certificate**: REL-2024-001

## Item History

The basketball was obtained at a charity event in 1996 and has been maintained in climate-controlled storage since acquisition.

## Why This Item Matters

Michael Jordan memorabilia from his championship years represents some of the most sought-after collectibles in sports history.
author: Relique Team

title: Upcoming Events: Collectors Showcase 2024
excerpt: Join us at upcoming events where you can meet collectors and learn more about authentication.
content:
